elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why is the cell with Damian's grade in the 3rd semester highlighted in yellow?
elements.correctAnswer: Because the decimal separator in the Swiss profile is a point. A comma is therefore interpreted as text and is not a numerical value between 1 and 6.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Your vocational trainer wants the progress of the semester grades to be visible in the HKBe so that she has a quick overview during the individual assessment meetings. How do you solve this?
elements.correctAnswer: Conditional formatting, e.g. with a symbol set.
